mapper.select: select p.pid, c.cimage1, c.cimage2, c.ccolorimage, p.pname, p.pprice, p.bname, c.ccolorcode from product p join color c on p.pid = c.pid

select p.pid, c.cimage1, c.cimage2, c.ccolorimage, p.pname, p.pprice, p.bname, c.ccolorcode, p.clarge, p.cmedium, p.csmall from product p join color c on p.pid = c.pid where p.clarge = #{param1} and p.cmedium = #{param2} and p.csmall = #{param3}
